actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to reimburse State and local law enforcement agencies for assistance provided at the request of the United States Secret Service.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to reimburse State and local law enforcement agencies for assistance provided at the request of the United States Secret Service in furtherance of the protection of any person whom the Secret Service is authorized by law to protect.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to reimburse State and local law enforcement agencies for assistance provided at the request of the United States Secret Service.
